snippet.title: Gundam 0079 - The War for Earth trailer
snippet.description: Trailer for a game based on Gundam made for Bandai by Presto Studios and released in Japan in 1997. A US release never made it over here. This trailer is from the Buried in Time CD, an adventure game from Presto Studios.
